trans-unit.source: If a failure occurs in Union, Rehearsal serves a different and critical purpose. When you submit a new change and it fixes the break in Union, you will have proved that a sequence of two changes, one that breaks the system, and one that comes after and fixes it, results in a healthy system. You do not yet know what happens when you apply the cumulative change to an environment that never saw the failure. Sometimes a fix’s success depends upon state left behind as a result of a preceding failure. The Rehearsal stage is an opportunity to test the change in an environment that didn’t see the failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果Union发生故障，排练将达到不同的关键目的。当您提交新的更改并修复Union中的中断时，您将证明一系列的两个更改（一个会破坏系统，另一个在之后进行修复）会导致系统正常运行。您尚不知道将累积更改应用于从未发生过故障的环境时会发生什么。有时，修复程序的成功取决于先前失败导致的遗留状态。排练阶段是在未发现故障的环境中测试变更的机会。

trans-unit.target: 如果git存储库包含许多食谱，则用户可以使用 rel 选项指定所需食谱的路径：

trans-unit.source: If a job dies, all remaining processes with the same process ID may be kept running. Set to true to kill all remaining processes.
trans-unit.target: 如果作业死亡，则具有相同进程ID的所有其余进程可以保持运行。设置为 true 可终止所有剩余进程。

trans-unit.source: If a job dies, all remaining processes with the same process ID may be kept running. Set to true to kill all remaining processes.
trans-unit.target: 如果作业死亡,所有具有相同进程ID的剩余进程可能会继续运行。设为true可杀死所有剩余进程。

trans-unit.source: If a keyserver is provided, this is assumed to be the fingerprint; otherwise it can be either the URI of GPG key for the repo, or a cookbook_file.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了keyserver,则假定为指纹;否则可以是repo的GPG密钥的URI,或cookbook_file。

trans-unit.source: If a named configuration is not provided, chef-shell will attempt to load the chef-shell.rb file from the .chef directory. For example: ~/.chef/chef_shell.rb
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供命名配置，chef-shell将尝试从 .chef 目录中加载chef-shell.rb文件。例如： ~/.chef/chef_shell.rb

trans-unit.source: If a new page is created or an old page is deleted, they must be added or removed from the sitemap.md page.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建了新页面或删除了旧页面，则必须从 sitemap.md 页面中添加或删除它们。

trans-unit.target: 如果生成了新的私钥,私钥和公钥都会被返回。

trans-unit.source: If a node is found to have a state other than ‘running’, the node status is then also updated to ‘unreachable’.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现某个节点的状态不是“正在运行”，则该节点的状态也将更新为“无法访问”。

trans-unit.source: If a policy is assigned to an API token on creation, the API token will have permissions. If no policy is selected during its creation, the API token will have no permissions. To assign permissions to the API token any time after creation, navigate to Policies in the Settings tab, locate the appropriate policy, and then add the API token as a member of the policy using a member expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建时将策略分配给API令牌，则该API令牌将具有权限。如果在创建过程中未选择任何策略，则该API令牌将没有权限。要在创建后随时向API令牌分配权限，请导航至“设置”标签中的“策略”，找到适当的策略，然后使用member expression将API令牌添加为该策略的成员。

trans-unit.source: If a problem is discovered in Union (it will happen, that is what Union is for), the cooperating teams need to have a conversation about the right fix. Sometimes the fix may require a change on a different project than the one that initiated the break. To fix the break, you submit a new change through the pipeline. Chef Automate is fundamentally a roll-forward system.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Union中发现了一个问题(会发生的,这就是Union的作用),合作团队需要就正确的修复进行对话。有时,修复可能需要在不同的项目上进行变更,而不是发起中断的项目。为了修复中断,你需要通过管道提交一个新的变更。Chef Automate从根本上说是一个滚滚向前的系统。

trans-unit.source: If a problem is discovered in Union (it will happen, that is what Union is for), the cooperating teams need to have a conversation about the right fix. Sometimes the fix may require a change on a different project than the one that initiated the break. To fix the break, you submit a new change through the pipeline. Workflow is fundamentally a roll-forward system.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Union中发现了一个问题(会发生的,这就是Union的作用),合作团队需要就正确的修复进行对话。有时,修复可能需要在不同的项目上进行变更,而不是发起中断的项目。为了修复中断,你需要通过管道提交一个新的变更。工作流从根本上说是一个滚滚向前的系统。

trans-unit.source: If a project has pending edits from changes to ingest rules, then all projects must be updated for those pending edits to take effect. Updating projects will apply all pending edits and move ingested resources into the correct projects. This background process can take a few minutes for systems with a limited number of nodes, and several days for systems with a large number of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目具有从更改到摄取规则的待定编辑，则必须更新所有项目才能使那些待定编辑生效。更新项目将应用所有待处理的编辑，并将提取的资源移到正确的项目中。这个后台进程可以采取系统几分钟时间有限数量的节点，而数天与大量节点的系统。

trans-unit.source: If a project is a cookbook, we recommend starting with delivery-truck, an open source build cookbook created for driving cookbook pipelines in Chef Automate. You can customize some aspects of delivery-truck through your project’s .delivery/config.json. To have more control or to opt-out of some of the behavior of delivery-truck, create a wrapper build cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目是食谱，则我们建议从 delivery-truck 开始，这是一个开放源代码的构建食谱，用于在Chef Automate中驱动食谱管道。您可以通过项目的 .delivery/config.json 定制 delivery-truck 某些方面。要具有更多控制权或选择不使用 delivery-truck 的某些行为，请创建包装构建手册。

trans-unit.source: If a project is a cookbook, we recommend starting with delivery-truck, an open source build cookbook created for driving cookbook pipelines in Chef Automate. You can customize some aspects of delivery-truck through your project’s .delivery/config.json. To have more control or to opt-out of some of the behavior of delivery-truck, create a wrapper build cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目是食谱，则我们建议从delivery-truck开始，这是一个开放源代码的构建食谱，用于在Chef Automate中驱动食谱管道。您可以通过项目的 .delivery/config.json 定制送货卡车的某些方面。要具有更多控制权或选择不使用Delivery-truck的某些行为，请创建包装构建手册。

trans-unit.source: If a recently deposed leader is likely the node with the most up-to-date data, you may want to reinstate its leadership.
trans-unit.target: 如果最近被罢免的领导很可能是拥有最新数据的节点,你可能要恢复其领导地位。

trans-unit.source: If a request is made for the feed after the waiting period, then the request will result in a single event, a “summary” event, which contains the same data as requesting a named-job resource. In this case, any Last-Event-ID will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果在等待期之后请求提要，则该请求将导致一个事件，即“摘要”事件，其中包含与请求命名作业资源相同的数据。在这种情况下，任何 Last-Event-ID 都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If a resource group contains one virtual machine with an OS disk and 2 data disks that are all Managed Disks, then the count would be 3.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个资源组包含一个虚拟机,其中有一个操作系统磁盘和2个数据磁盘,而这些磁盘都是托管磁盘,那么计数将是3。

trans-unit.source: If a response other than "0 processes are in enforce mode" or "0 profiles are in enforce mode." is returned, AppArmor must be set to Complaining mode or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果响应不是 "0 processes are in enforce mode" 或 "0 profiles are in enforce mode." 返回时，必须将AppArmor设置为 Complaining 模式或禁用。

trans-unit.source: If a response other than "Disabled" or "Permissive" is returned, SELinux must be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回的响应不是 "Disabled" 或 "Permissive" 则必须禁用SELinux。

trans-unit.source: If a running Supervisor cannot decrypt a secret due to a missing key, it will retry with exponential backoff starting with a one-second interval. This allows an administrator to provide the Supervisor with the key to resume normal operations, without taking down the Supervisor.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行中的 Supervisor 因缺少密钥而无法解密秘密,它将从一秒钟的间隔开始以指数后退的方式重试。这允许管理员向 Supervisor 提供密钥以恢复正常操作,而无需关闭 Supervisor。

trans-unit.source: If a specific recipe is included more than once with the include_recipe method or elsewhere in the run_list directly, only the first instance is processed and subsequent inclusions are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 include_recipe 方法或直接在run_list中的其他位置多次包含特定配方，则仅处理第一个实例，然后忽略后续包含。

trans-unit.source: If a string or a block return false, the Chef Infra Client run will stop and an error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串或块返回 false ，则Chef Infra Client运行将停止，并引发错误。

trans-unit.source: If a string or a block return false, the Chef Infra Client run will stop and an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串或块返回 false ，则Chef Infra Client运行将停止并返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If a string or a block return false, the chef-client run will stop and an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串或块返回 false ，则chef-client运行将停止并返回错误。

trans-unit.target: 如果用户通过LDAP或SAML登录后,看到了一个

trans-unit.source: If all goes according to plan, the first node should be ready to restart, pull down all the packages and/or scripts, load Chef Infra Client, and do the first client run.
trans-unit.target: 如果一切按计划进行,第一个节点应该准备好重新启动,拉下所有的包和/或脚本,加载Chef Infra Client,并进行第一次客户端运行。

trans-unit.source: If all goes according to plan, then you should be ready to reset/restart your first node, have it pull down all the packages and/or scripts, load Chef Infra Client, and do the first client run.
trans-unit.target: 如果一切按计划进行,那么你应该准备好重置/重新启动你的第一个节点,让它拉下所有的包和/或脚本,加载Chef Infra Client,并进行第一次客户端运行。

trans-unit.source: If all phases of Union succeed, then the Rehearsal stage is triggered. Rehearsal increases confidence in the artifacts and the deployment by repeating the process that occurred in Union in a different environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果Union的所有阶段都成功,那么就会触发排练阶段。演练通过在不同的环境中重复Union中发生的过程,增加对工件和部署的信心。

trans-unit.source: If an SSL notice is shown due to your self-signed certificate while connecting to Chef Supermarket via a web browser, accept the SSL certificate. A trusted SSL certificate should be used for private Chef Supermarket that is used in production.
trans-unit.target: 如果在通过网络浏览器连接到Chef Supermarket时,由于您的自签证书而显示SSL通知,请接受SSL证书。对于生产中使用的私人Chef Supermarket,应该使用可信的SSL证书。

trans-unit.source: If an SSL notice is shown while connecting to Chef Supermarket via a web browser, accept the SSL certificate. A trusted SSL certificate should be used for private Chef Supermarket that is used in production.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过网页浏览器连接到Chef Supermarket时显示SSL通知,请接受SSL证书。对于生产中使用的私人Chef Supermarket,应该使用可信的SSL证书。

trans-unit.source: If an absolute path is provided, the exist matcher tests if the command exists on the filesystem at the specified location. Otherwise, the exist matcher tests if the command is found in the PATH.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了绝对路径，则 exist 匹配器将测试命令在文件系统上的指定位置是否存在。否则， exist 如果命令在PATH中找到匹配测试。

trans-unit.source: If an audit was unsuccessful, the chef-client will return output similar to:
trans-unit.target: 如果审核不成功,chef-client将返回类似的输出。

trans-unit.source: If an environment variable is set, it MUST be lowercase. If it is not, add a lowercase version of that proxy variable to the shell (e.g. ~/.bashrc) using one (or more) the following commands.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了环境变量，则必须小写。如果不是，请使用以下一个（或多个）命令将该代理变量的小写版本添加到外壳中（例如 ~/.bashrc ）。

trans-unit.source: If an existing file is present and the third argument is set with a shasum digest, the file will be checked to see if it’s valid. If so, the function ends early and returns 0. Otherwise, the shasums do not match so the file-on-disk is removed and a normal download proceeds as though no previous file existed. This is designed to restart an interrupted download.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在现有文件，并且使用shasum摘要设置了第三个参数，则将检查该文件以查看其是否有效。如果是这样，该函数将提前结束并返回0。否则，阴影将不匹配，因此将删除磁盘上的文件，并且可以进行正常下载，就好像之前的文件不存在一样。旨在重新启动中断的下载。

trans-unit.source: If an explicit gem_binary parameter is not being used with the gem_package resource, it is preferable to provide the install options as a hash. This approach allows the provider to install the gem without needing to spawn an external gem process.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与 gem_package 资源一起使用显式的 gem_binary 参数，则最好提供安装选项作为哈希值。这种方法允许提供程序安装gem，而无需产生外部gem进程。

trans-unit.source: If an organization does not have any nodes associated with it, it does not show up in the Nodes section of the Chef Automate UI. This is also true for roles, cookbooks, recipes, attributes, resources, node names, and environments. Only those items that have a node associated with them will appear in the UI. Chef Automate has all the data for all of these, but does not highlight them in the UI. This is designed to keep the UI focused on the nodes in your cluster.
trans-unit.target: 如果组织没有与之关联的任何节点，则该组织不会显示在Chef Automate UI的“节点”部分中。对于角色，食谱，配方，属性，资源，节点名称和环境也是如此。只有那些与之相关联的节点的项目才会出现在UI中。 Chef Automate拥有所有这些的所有数据，但未在UI中突出显示它们。这是为了使UI专注于群集中的节点。

trans-unit.source: If an organization is using an internal certificate authority, then the root certificate will not appear in any cacerts.pem file that ships by default with operating systems and web browsers. Because of this, no currently deployed system will be able to verify certificates that are issued in this manner. To allow other systems to trust certificates from an internal certificate authority, this root certificate will need to be configured so that other systems can follow the chain of authority back to the root certificate. (An intermediate certificate is not enough because the root certificate is not already globally known.)
trans-unit.target: 如果组织正在使用内部证书颁发机构，则默认情况下，根证书不会出现在操作系统和Web浏览器附带的任何 cacerts.pem 文件中。因此，当前没有部署的系统将能够验证以此方式颁发的证书。为了允许其他系统信任来自内部证书颁发机构的证书，将需要配置此根证书，以便其他系统可以遵循权限链回到根证书。 （中间证书是不够的，因为根证书尚未在全球范围内广为人知。）

trans-unit.source: If an organization is using an internal certificate authority, then the root certificate will not appear in any cacerts.pem file that ships by default with operating systems and web browsers. Because of this, no currently deployed system will be able to verify certificates that are issued in this manner. To allow other systems to trust certificates from an internal certificate authority, this root certificate will need to be configured so that other systems can follow the chain of authority back to the root certificate. (An intermediate certificate is not enough becuase the root certificate is not already globally known.)
trans-unit.target: 如果组织使用内部证书颁发机构，则默认情况下，根证书不会出现在操作系统和Web浏览器附带的任何 cacerts.pem 文件中。因此，当前部署的系统都无法验证以此方式颁发的证书。为了允许其他系统信任来自内部证书颁发机构的证书，需要配置此根证书，以便其他系统可以遵循权限链回到根证书。（由于根证书尚未全局已知，因此中间证书还不够。）

trans-unit.source: If any of our PINGREQ targets receive an ACK, they forward it to us, and the member remains Alive.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们的PINGREQ目标收到ACK,他们就会把它转发给我们,而该成员仍然活着。

trans-unit.source: If any tests fail for either project, the entire Union run will fail and neither project will be automatically promoted. Additionally, if there’s another failed Union run before the first one fails which includes some of the same projects, then all the projects from both Union runs must pass their tests before anything can be promoted.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个项目的任何测试失败，则整个联合运行将失败，并且两个项目都不会自动升级。此外，如果在第一个失败之前有另一个失败的Union运行，其中包括一些相同的项目，则两个Union运行中的所有项目都必须通过测试，然后才能进行任何升级。

trans-unit.source: If capture is enabled, then the client will capture both the stdout and the stderr channels of the command. If the command produced no output, then the value will be an empty string.

trans-unit.source: If it finds a plan both inside as well as outside of a target folder, the target specific plan will be used as long as that is the target currently being built. However it is strongly recommended that you do not have plans both inside and outside of a target folder. We currently allow this only for backwards compatibility with some existing plans but plan to eventually fail builds where a plan exists in both places. The best practice when you need multiple plans for different targets is to put each plan in its own target folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果它发现目标文件夹内外都有计划,只要是当前正在构建的目标,就会使用该目标的特定计划。然而,我们强烈建议您不要在目标文件夹内外都有计划。目前,我们只允许这样做,以便向后兼容一些现有的计划,但计划最终会在计划存在于两个地方的情况下失败。当您需要为不同的目标制定多个计划时,最好的做法是将每个计划放在它自己的目标文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: If new_size or heap_size is also specified directly in java_opts, it will be ignored in favor of the chef-server.rb values or the defaults as calculated here. Only use chef-server.rb to set heap and new sizes. Learn more about Elasticsearch heap-size. It will error out if the system memory is less than 4 GB. This value is bounded between 1 GB - 28 GB.
trans-unit.target: 如果还直接在java_opts中指定了new_size或heap_size，则将忽略它，而使用Chef-server.rb值或此处计算的默认值。仅使用chef-server.rb设置堆和新大小。了解有关Elasticsearch heap-size的更多信息。如果系统内存小于4 GB，它将出错。此值的范围是1 GB-28 GB。

trans-unit.source: If no NAMED_CONF is given chef-shell will load ~/.chef/chef_shell.rb if it exists
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给定NAMED_CONF,chef-shell会加载~/.chef/chef_shell.rb,如果它存在的话。

trans-unit.source: If no Supervisor can make contact with Supervisor B, either directly or indirectly, the network comes to view Supervisor B as “confirmed” dead. In this case, Supervisor B is effectively removed from all membership lists across the network. As a result, no Supervisors try to contact it again. This is ultimately what happens when you shut down a Supervisor; the rest of the network realizes that it is gone and can reconfigure any services to no longer communicate with any services that were running on it.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有Supervisor可以直接或间接与Supervisor B联系，则网络将Supervisor B视为“已确认”死亡。在这种情况下，Supervisor B实际上已从网络上的所有成员资格列表中删除。结果，没有主管尝试再次联系它。当您关闭主管时，最终将发生这种情况。网络的其余部分意识到它已经不复存在，可以重新配置任何服务以不再与在其上运行的任何服务进行通信。

trans-unit.source: If no chef_shell.rb can be found, chef-shell falls back to load:
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到chef_shell.rb,chef-shell就会退回到加载状态。

trans-unit.source: If nodes in a backend HA cluster are not available, etcd may not be able to form a cluster. If etcd cannot form a cluster, rebuild the cluster. trans-unit.target: 如果后端HA群集中的节点不可用，则etcd可能无法形成群集。如果etcd无法形成集群，请重建集群。首先在活动节点上重置集群标识符，重建将成为集群一部分的节点，然后使用 chef-backend-ctl join-cluster 子命令将重建后的节点重新加入集群。

trans-unit.source: If not set, the table is partitioned by pseudo column, referenced via either ‘_PARTITIONTIME’ as TIMESTAMP type, or ‘_PARTITIONDATE’ as DATE type. trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true,则重定向请求中的URL方案设置为https。如果设置为false,则重定向请求中的URL方案将与请求中的URL方案保持一致。这必须只为TargetHttpProxys中使用的UrlMaps设置。不允许为TargetHttpsProxy设置为true。默认设置为false。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the specified action is not enforced.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",则不执行指定的操作。

trans-unit.source: If set, any properly signed requests arriving at /organizations/ORGNAME/owners/OWNER/compliance will be forwarded to this URL. This is expected to be a fully qualified resource, e.g. http://compliance.example.org/owners/OWNER/compliance.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则到达 /organizations/ORGNAME/owners/OWNER/compliance 的任何正确签名的请求都将转发到此URL。这应该是完全合格的资源，例如 http://compliance.example.org/owners/OWNER/compliance 。

trans-unit.source: If source ranges are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic that has source IP address in these ranges. These ranges must be expressed in CIDR format. One or both of sourceRanges and sourceTags may be set. If both properties are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP that belongs to a tag listed in the sourceTags property. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply. Only IPv4 is supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源范围,防火墙将只适用于源 IP 地址在这些范围内的流量。这些范围必须以 CIDR 格式表示。可以设置 sourceRanges 和 sourceTags 中的一个或两个。如果同时设置了这两个属性,防火墙将应用于源 IP 地址在 sourceRanges 内或源 IP 属于 sourceTags 属性中列出的标记的流量。连接不需要同时匹配这两个属性,防火墙就可以应用。仅支持 IPv4。

trans-unit.source: If source service accounts are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic originating from an instance with a service account in this list. Source service accounts cannot be used to control traffic to an instance’s external IP address because service accounts are associated with an instance, not an IP address. sourceRanges can be set at the same time as sourceServiceAccounts. If both are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP belongs to an instance with service account listed in sourceServiceAccount. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply. sourceServiceAccounts cannot be used at the same time as sourceTags or targetTags.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源服务帐户，则防火墙将仅应用于源自该列表中具有服务帐户的实例的流量。源服务帐户不能用于控制到实例的外部IP地址的流量，因为服务帐户与实例而不是IP地址关联。可以与sourceServiceAccounts同时设置sourceRanges。如果两者都设置，则防火墙将应用于在sourceRanges中具有源IP地址的流量，或者源IP属于具有在serviceServiceAccount中列出的服务帐户的实例。该连接不需要同时匹配两个属性即可应用防火墙。 sourceServiceAccounts不能与sourceTags或targetTags一起使用。

trans-unit.source: If source tags are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic with source IP that belongs to a tag listed in source tags. Source tags cannot be used to control traffic to an instance’s external IP address. Because tags are associated with an instance, not an IP address. One or both of sourceRanges and sourceTags may be set. If both properties are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP that belongs to a tag listed in the sourceTags property. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源标签，则防火墙将仅应用于源IP属于源标签中列出的标签的流量。源标签不能用于控制到实例的外部IP地址的流量。因为标签与实例而不是IP地址相关联。可以设置sourceRanges和sourceTag之一或两者。如果同时设置了这两个属性，则防火墙将应用于具有sourceRanges中的源IP地址或属于sourceTags属性中列出的标签的源IP的流量。该连接不需要同时匹配两个属性即可应用防火墙。

trans-unit.source: If the health-check hook exits with a non-ok status the next health-check will run after the default health-check interval (thirty seconds). This is only done when the configured interval is greater than the default interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果 health-check 挂钩以 ok 状态退出，则下一个运行 health-check 将在默认的运行 health-check 间隔（三十秒）之后运行。仅当配置的间隔大于默认间隔时才执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: If the health-check hook returns an ok status for the first time, then the next health-check will run after a randomly chosen delay between 0 and the configured health-check interval. This introduces a splay - a degree of difference - in the timing between the first and second health-check runs. All following health-check hooks run at the configured interval. The splay prevents more than one health-check hook from starting at the same time by giving each of them a unique starting point.
trans-unit.target: 如果 health-check 钩子返回一个 ok 的第一次状态，那么下一个 health-check 将0之间以及所配置的一个随机选择的延迟后运行 health-check 间隔。这就在第一次和第二次 health-check 运行之间的时间安排上产生了偏差（一定程度的差异）。随后的所有运行状况检查挂钩均以配置的时间间隔运行。扩展功能为每个健康检查钩子提供了一个唯一的起点，从而阻止了同时启动多个健康检查钩子。

trans-unit.source: If the include_recipe method is used more than once to include a recipe, only the first inclusion is processed and any subsequent inclusions are ignored.

trans-unit.source: If there are failures as you work through the remaining world, you may discover this is due to a) an older version of the software that can’t build against a newer/different compiler, b) a failure that is currently in master and not yet caught (ex: source url now returns a 404), c) other issues which require more debugging and work. You can try to fix the package at this moment and re-run the stage3-build-remaining-plan.sh which will resume your failed build and continue. Alternatively, you could remove that Plan out of the rebuild set and deal with it separately. The catch here is that your failing package might become a dependency of another package later on, so you would want to remove those as well. Thankfully, there’s a way you can get this list, by running another program in the core-plans repository. Note that you want to run this in the same common parent directory containing the core-plans and habitat git clones, and also outside of a Studio. Let’s assume that the plan is for core/doxygen. You can run:
trans-unit.target: 如果在遍历其余世界时出现故障，您可能会发现这是由于以下原因造成的：a）无法针对较新/不同的编译器构建的较旧版本的软件，b）当前在主系统中而不是在当前环境中的故障尚未捕获（例如：源URL现在返回404），c）其他需要更多调试和工作的问题。您可以在此时尝试修复该软件包，然后重新运行 stage3-build-remaining-plan.sh ，它将继续执行失败的构建并继续。或者，您可以从重建集中删除该计划并单独处理。这里的问题是，失败的程序包可能以后会成为另一个程序包的依赖项，因此您也希望删除它们。幸运的是，有一种方法可以通过在 core-plans 运行另一个程序来获取此列表资料库。请注意，您要在包含 core-plans 和 habitat git克隆的同一公共父目录中以及Studio外部运行此文件。让我们假设该计划是针对 core/doxygen 的。您可以运行：

trans-unit.source: If two operations concurrently attempt to update the contents of a data bag, the last-written attempt will be the operation to update the contents of the data bag. This situation can lead to data loss, so organizations should take steps to ensure that only one Chef Infra Client is making updates to a data bag at a time.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个操作同时尝试更新数据袋的内容,最后写入的尝试将是更新数据袋内容的操作。这种情况可能会导致数据丢失,因此组织应采取措施,确保每次只有一个Chef Infra Client对数据袋进行更新。

trans-unit.source: If used outside a control block, only_if skips all controls in the current file
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制块之外使用，则 only_if 会跳过当前文件中的所有控件

trans-unit.source: If using Subversion as the version source control application, it is important not to upload certain files that Subversion uses to maintain the version history of each file. This is because Chef Infra Client will never use it while configuring nodes, plus the amount of data in an upload that includes top-level Subversion data could be significant.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Subversion作为版本源控制应用程序,重要的是不要上传某些文件,Subversion使用它来维护每个文件的版本历史。这是因为Chef Infra Client在配置节点时永远不会使用它,另外,上传中包含顶级Subversion数据的数据量可能很大。

trans-unit.source: If using the Chef extension in an ARM template, it is recommended that you base64 encode your validation key and set this option to base64encoded
trans-unit.target: 如果在ARM模板中使用Chef扩展，建议对base64验证密钥进行编码，并将此选项设置为 base64encoded 。

trans-unit.source: If values are missing, they will not be overwritten. If public_key is null, the public key will not be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少值，则不会覆盖它们。如果 public_key 为null，则不会覆盖公共密钥。

trans-unit.source: If we do not receive an “ACK” in 1 second, choose 5 peers (the “PINGREQ targets”), and send them a “PINGREQ(member)” message for the member who failed the PING.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在1秒钟内未收到“ ACK”，请选择5个对等方（“ PINGREQ目标”），并向失败的PING成员发送“ PINGREQ（成员）”消息。

trans-unit.source: If we do not receive an ACK via PINGREQ with 2.1 seconds, we mark the member as Suspect, and set an expiration timer of 9.3 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果在2.1秒内没有收到PINGREQ的ACK,我们就会将该成员标记为Suspect,并设置9.3秒的过期计时器。

trans-unit.source: If we do not receive an Alive status for the member within the 9.3 second suspicion expiration window, the member is marked as Confirmed.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在9.3秒的怀疑到期窗口内没有收到该成员的生存状态,则该成员被标记为确认。

trans-unit.target: 如果我们在1秒钟之前收到“ ACK”消息，则该成员仍保持活动状态。

trans-unit.source: If you have configured the backup directory to a directory other than the default directory (/var/opt/chef-automate/backups), you must supply the backup directory. Without a backup ID, Chef Automate uses the most recent backup in the backup directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果已将备份目录配置为默认目录（ /var/opt/chef-automate/backups ）以外的目录，则必须提供备份目录。如果没有备份ID，Chef Automate将使用备份目录中的最新备份。

trans-unit.source: If you have FIPS compliance enabled at the kernel level and install or reconfigure the Chef Infra Server then it will default to running in FIPS mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在内核级别启用了 FIPS 合规性,并安装或重新配置 Chef Infra Server,那么它将默认为在 FIPS 模式下运行。

trans-unit.source: If you have FIPS compliance enabled at the kernel level then Chef Infra Client will default to running in FIPS mode. Otherwise you can add fips true to the /etc/chef/client.rb or C:\\chef\\client.rb.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在内核级别启用了FIPS合规性，则Chef Infra Client将默认以FIPS模式运行。否则，您可以将 fips true 值添加到 /etc/chef/client.rb 或 C:\\chef\\client.rb 。

trans-unit.source: If you have FIPS compliance enabled in the operating system at the kernel level and install or reconfigure the Chef Automate server then it will default to running in FIPS mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在内核级别的操作系统中启用了 FIPS 合规性,并安装或重新配置 Chef Automate 服务器,那么它将默认为在 FIPS 模式下运行。

trans-unit.source: If you have a Name tag applied to the EC2 instance, this can be used to lookup the instance. This must be passed as a name: 'value' key-value entry in a hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将 Name 标签应用于EC2实例，则可以使用它来查找实例。这必须作为 name: 'value' 传递：散列中的“值”键值条目。

trans-unit.source: If you have a GitHub repository with multiple components inside, you will most likely also have individual plans for those components that are located inside of component subfolders. By default, Builder will only look for a package plan in either the root of the repository, or in a habitat subfolder at the root. If it does not find a plan file in those locations, it will not automatically issue builds when it detects file changes in the repository.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的GitHub存储库中包含多个组件，则很可能还有位于组件子文件夹内的那些组件的单独计划。默认情况下，Builder只会在存储库的根目录或根目录的 habitat 子文件夹中查找包装计划。如果在这些位置找不到计划文件，当它在存储库中检测到文件更改时，它将不会自动发布构建。

trans-unit.source: If you have a WSUS Server and Target Groups, set this True
trans-unit.target: 如果您有WSUS服务器和目标组,请将此设置为真。

trans-unit.source: If you have a bunch of nested cookbooks or Policyfiles in a complex Chef Roles and Chef Environments setup, you may not want to move to Effortless.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在复杂的“厨师角色”和“厨师环境”设置中有一堆嵌套的食谱或策略文件，则可能不想迁移到“轻松”。

trans-unit.source: If you have a cookbook that relies on platform_family 'rhel' to support Red Hat based distributions as well as Amazon Linux, you’ll need to modify your code to specifically check for the 'amazon' platform family.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一本依赖 platform_family 'rhel' 来支持基于Red Hat的发行版以及Amazon Linux的食谱，则需要修改代码以专门检查 'amazon' 平台系列。

trans-unit.source: If you have a cookbook that relies on data from node['cloud'] you will need to update the code to the new format in Chef Client 13. On a Chef Client 12 or earlier node you can compare the data formats by running ohai cloud and ohai cloud_v2.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一本依赖于 node['cloud'] 数据的菜谱，则需要在Chef Client 13中将代码更新为新格式。在Chef Client 12或更早的节点上，您可以通过运行 ohai cloud 比较数据格式和 ohai cloud_v2 。

trans-unit.source: If you have a cookbook that relies on data from node['cloud_v2'] you will need to update the code to instead use node['cloud'] attributes. Keep in mind that if you’re attempting to support Chef < 13 this data will be different. Foodcritic’s FC095 rule will detect any usage of the node['cloud_v2'] attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一个食谱依赖于 node['cloud_v2'] 数据，则需要更新代码以改为使用 node['cloud'] cloud'v ]属性。请记住，如果您尝试支持Chef <13，则此数据将有所不同。Foodcritic的FC095规则将检测到 node['cloud_v2'] 属性的任何使用情况。

trans-unit.source: If you have a cookbook that relies on data from node['filesystem'] you will need to update the code to use data in the new format when migrating to Chef Client 13 or later. On a Chef Client 12 or earlier node you can view the new format by running ohai filesystem2 or on a Chef Client 13+ node you can run ohai filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的食谱依赖于 node['filesystem'] 数据，则在迁移到Chef Client 13或更高版本时，需要更新代码以使用新格式的数据。在Chef Client 12或更早版本的节点上，您可以通过运行ohai filesystem2查看新格式，或者在Chef Client 13+节点上可以运行 ohai filesystem 。

trans-unit.source: If you have a cookbook that relies on data from node['filesystem2'] you will need to update the code to instead use node['filesystem']. Keep in mind that if you’re attempting to support releases earlier than Chef Client 13 the data structure of node[‘filesystem’] will be different. Foodcritic’s FC094 rule will detect any usage of the node['filesystem_v2'] attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一本依赖于 node['filesystem2'] 数据的菜谱，则需要更新代码以改为使用 node['filesystem'] 。请记住，如果您尝试支持低于Chef Client 13的发行版，则node ['filesystem']的数据结构将有所不同。Foodcritic的FC094规则将检测到 node['filesystem_v2'] 属性的任何使用情况。

trans-unit.source: If you have a pre-existing fleet of Supervisors which have already been started up with their own individually-generated secrets, you will likely want to overwrite their existing CTL_SECRET files with one that has a key of your own creation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一个预先存在的Supervisor CTL_SECRET ，并且已经使用他们自己生成的秘密启动了，那么您可能希望使用具有自己创建的密钥的Supervisor覆盖他们现有的CTL_SECRET文件。

trans-unit.source: If you have access to Chef Infra Server through Automate or Chef Manage, you can download the starter kit. The starter kit will create the necessary configuration files: the .chef directory, config.rb, ORGANIZATION-validator.pem, and USER.pem. Simply download the starter kit and then move it to the desired location on your Chef Workstation machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果您可以通过“自动化”或“厨师管理”访问Chef Infra Server，则可以下载入门工具包。入门工具包将创建必要的配置文件： .chef 目录， config.rb ， ORGANIZATION-validator.pem 和 USER.pem 。只需下载入门工具包，然后将其移动到Chef Workstation机器上的所需位置即可。

trans-unit.source: If you have access to Chef server (hosted or on premises), you can download the starter kit. The starter kit will create the necessary configuration files—the .chef directory, knife.rb, the ORGANIZATION-validator.pem, and USER.pem files) with the correct information that is required to interact with the Chef server. Simply download the starter kit and then move it to the desired location on your workstation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有权访问Chef服务器（托管的或本地的），则可以下载入门工具包。入门工具包将创建必要的配置文件-.chef目录，knife.rb，ORGANIZATION-validator.pem和USER.pem文件），其中包含与Chef服务器进行交互所需的正确信息。只需下载入门工具包，然后将其移动到工作站上的所需位置即可。

trans-unit.source: If you really do need to do this, it is easiest to make a local resource with a new name and refer to the core resource directly. trans-unit.target: 如果确实需要执行此操作，则最简单的方法是使用新名称创建本地资源并直接引用核心资源。否则，您需要在运行配置文件之前确保注册了 require "inspec/resource/<name>" 的核心资源（通过要求“ inspec / resource / <name>”），以确保它已被急切地加载到全局资源注册表中。

trans-unit.source: If you rely on knife search, or setting up a new Chef Infra Server is not possible, upload the upgraded cookbooks to your existing Chef Infra Server. trans-unit.source: If you use Chef Infra or Chef InSpec to manage your operating system configs, you should look at using Effortless. Effortless uses the power of Chef Habitat to help with you with Chef Infra and Chef InSpec dependency management. Chef Habitat pulls in the cookbooks and profiles that your cookbook and/or Chef InSpec profiles depend upon and packages them as a signed artifact. By packaging the latest and best practices for running Chef Infra and Chef InSpec on your systems, you do not have to worry about setting up the Chef Infra Client or the Chef InSpec client to run on your system.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用Chef Infra或Chef InSpec来管理你的操作系统配置,你应该考虑使用Effortless。Effortless使用Chef Habitat的力量来帮助你管理Chef Infra和Chef InSpec的依赖性。Chef Habitat会把你的食谱和配置文件拉到你的食谱和/或Chef InSpec配置文件上,并把它们打包成一个签名的工件。通过打包最新和最佳实践,在您的系统上运行Chef Infra和Chef InSpec,您不必担心设置Chef Infra客户端或Chef InSpec客户端在您的系统上运行。

trans-unit.source: If you use Chef Infra to deploy complex applications, you may not want to use the Effortless pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用Chef Infra来部署复杂的应用程序,你可能不想使用Effortless模式。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to connect to a remote machine (called a target within InSpec), you can use the -t flag. We support connecting using SSH, WinRM and docker. If no target is provided, we implicitly support the “local” target - i.e. tests running on the current machine running InSpec. For an SSH connection, use -i for specifying SSH key files, and the --sudo* commands for requesting a privilege escalation after logging in. For a WinRM connection, use --path to change the login path, --ssl to use SSL for transport layer encryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果要连接到远程计算机（在InSpec中称为目标），则可以使用 -t 标志。我们支持使用SSH，WinRM和docker进行连接。如果未提供目标，则我们隐式支持“本地”目标-即在运行InSpec的当前计算机上运行的测试。对于SSH连接，请使用 -i 指定SSH密钥文件，并使用 --sudo* 命令在登录后请求特权升级。对于WinRM连接，请使用 --path 更改登录路径，使用 --ssl 来使用用于传输层加密的SSL。

trans-unit.source: If your organization has provided custom SSL certificates to the Chef Infra Server, the locations of that custom certificate and private key are defined in /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb as values for the nginx['ssl_certificate'] and nginx['ssl_certificate_key'] settings. Delete the files referenced in those two settings and regenerate new keys using the same authority.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的组织已向Chef Infra Server提供了自定义SSL证书，则该自定义证书和私钥的位置在 /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb 中定义为 nginx['ssl_certificate'] 和 nginx['ssl_certificate_key'] 设置。删除这两个设置中引用的文件，并使用相同的权限重新生成新密钥。

Delete the files referenced in those two settings and regenerate new keys using the same authority.

trans-unit.source: If your permanent peer Supervisors are not running any services, they will be less subject to the pressures that would cause service-running Supervisors to come and go. They can exist solely to anchor the entire Supervisor network.

trans-unit.source: If your situation requires it, Chef Habitat makes it simple to switch from containerized to non-containerized workloads. This is because Chef Habitat packages only have a requirement on the kernel version of your operating system. (Linux: kernel 2.6.32 or later, Windows: Windows Server 2008 R2 or later and Windows 7 64-bit or later). You can take the same .hart file you use to export to a Docker container and run it on a virtual machine or bare metal. By only requiring the kernel, Chef Habitat gives you the ability to switch container formats or to switch to non-containerized workloads without significant rework.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的情况需要,Chef Habitat可以让你简单地从容器化工作负载切换到非容器化工作负载。这是因为Chef Habitat软件包只对你的操作系统的内核版本有要求。(Linux:内核2.6.32或更高版本,Windows。Windows Server 2008 R2或更新版本和Windows 7 64位或更新版本)。)你可以把你用来导出到Docker容器的同一个.hart文件,在虚拟机或裸机上运行。通过只需要内核,Chef Habitat为您提供了切换容器格式或切换到非容器化工作负载的能力,而无需大量返工。

trans-unit.source: In Chef Client 12.5.1 through 15, resources could be addressed from recipe code using only the name of the resource, provided that no other provides declaration was used in the same file.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Client 12.5.1到15中，如果在同一文件中未使用其他 provides 声明，则可以仅使用资源名称从配方代码访问资源。

trans-unit.source: In Chef Client 12.5.1, the custom resources API allowed specifying property names as the short form of property_name inside of actions, instead of the long form of new_resource.property_name (as was previously required in provider code in LWRPs/HWRPs/etc). That change caused unsolvable namespace clashes and will be removed in Chef Client 14.0, and it will become mandatory to refer to properties as new_resource.property_name in actions.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Client 12.5.1中，自定义资源API允许将属性名称指定为操作内 property_name 的缩写形式，而不是 new_resource.property_name 的长形式（以前在LWRP / HWRPs / etc中的提供程序代码中要求）。该更改导致无法解决的名称空间冲突，并将在Chef Client 14.0中删除，并且在操作 new_resource.property_name 属性称为new_resource.property_name成为强制性的。

trans-unit.source: In Chef Client 13, resources with the same name will be treated as entirely separate, without any cloning of properties.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Client 13中,同名的资源将被视为完全独立的资源,没有任何属性的克隆。

trans-unit.source: In Chef Client 14 several legacy mixins will be removed. Usage of these mixins has resulted in deprecation warnings for several years. They were traditionally used in some HWRPs, but are rarely found in code available on the Supermarket.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Client 14中,一些传统的mixins将被移除。这些混搭的使用已经导致了几年来的废弃警告。它们传统上在一些HWRP中使用,但很少在超市上的代码中出现。

trans-unit.source: In Chef Client 14, the short -r form will be removed, as it conflicts with the ability to specify a run list.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Client 14中，将删除short -r 表单，因为它与指定运行列表的能力相冲突。

trans-unit.source: In Chef Habitat 0.68.0 and less, some hooks used _ in their names. This is now deprecated; if you used them, please use - instead.

trans-unit.source: In Chef InSpec 4+, every input is namespaced. For example, you could have an input named wrapper/favorite_food and one named child/favorite_food. If no explicit profile option is set within the wrapper profile metadata file, then wrapper is assumed to be the profile.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef InSpec 4+中，每个输入都有名称空间。例如，您可能有一个名为 wrapper/favorite_food 的输入和一个名为 child/favorite_food 的输入。如果在 wrapper 配置文件元数据文件中未设置任何显式配置文件选项，则假定 wrapper 为配置文件。

trans-unit.source: In Chef InSpec you would split up groups into files.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef InSpec中,你会把组分成文件。

trans-unit.source: In Chef InSpec, a common pattern is to write a wrapper profile that depends on another profile. This pattern pulls profiles from a main profile source like the Chef Automate Profile Store. See an example of this pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef InSpec中，一种常见的模式是编写依赖于另一个配置文件的包装器配置文件。该模式从主要的配置文件源（例如Chef Automate概要文件存储）中提取配置文件。请参阅此模式的示例。

trans-unit.source: In Chef Infra Client 16.3 the node Blacklist and Whitelist features were renamed to Blocklist and Allowlist. For backwards compatibility the old configuration values will continue to work, but this document will describe the Blocklist and Allowlist names. See each section below for the appropriate legacy configuration values if you are running legacy clients in your organization.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Infra Client 16.3中,节点黑名单和白名单功能被重新命名为Blocklist和Allowlist。为了向后兼容,旧的配置值将继续工作,但本文档将描述 Blocklist 和 Allowlist 的名称。如果您在组织中运行的是旧版客户端,请参见下面的每个部分,以了解适当的旧版配置值。

trans-unit.source: In Chef, there are two different types of permissions issues, object specific and global permissions. To figure out which type of permission issue you’re experiencing, run Chef Infra Client again using the -l debug options to see debugging output.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef中，有两种不同类型的权限问题，特定对象权限和全局权限。要确定您遇到的是哪种类型的权限问题，请使用 -l debug 选项再次运行Chef Infra Client，以查看调试输出。

trans-unit.source: In Ohai/Chef Client 13 we replaced the existing Cloud plugin with the Cloud V2 plugin. That was done by having Ohai populate both node['cloud'] and node['cloud_v2'] with the data previously found at node['cloud_v2']. In Chef Client 14 we will no longer populate node['cloud_v2'].
trans-unit.target: 在Ohai / Chef Client 13中，我们将现有的Cloud插件替换为Cloud V2插件。这是通过让 node['cloud_v2'] 用先前在 node['cloud_v2'] 处找到的数据填充 node['cloud'] 和node ['cloud_v2']来完成的。在Chef Client 14中，我们将不再填充 node['cloud_v2'] 。

trans-unit.source: In Ohai/Chef Client 13 we replaced the existing Filesystem plugin with the Filesystem V2 plugin. That was done by having Ohai populate both node['filesystem'] and node['filesystem_v2'] with the data previously found at node['filesystem2']. In Chef Client 14 we will no longer populate node['filesystem2'].
trans-unit.target: 在Ohai / Chef Client 13中，我们用Filesystem V2插件替换了现有的Filesystem插件。这是通过让Ohai用先前在 node['filesystem2'] 处找到的数据填充 node['filesystem'] 和 node['filesystem_v2'] 来完成的。在Chef Client 14中，我们将不再填充 node['filesystem2'] 。

trans-unit.source: In Ohai/Chef Client 13 we replaced the existing Filesystem plugin with the Filesystem2 plugin. This was done by having the Filesystem2 plugin populate both node['fileystem2'] and node['filesystem']. The Filesystem2 plugin includes a different data format that resolves many of the longstanding bugs in the Filesystem plugin.
trans-unit.target: 在Ohai / Chef Client 13中，我们用Filesystem2插件替换了现有的Filesystem插件。这是通过让Filesystem2插件同时填充 node['fileystem2'] 和 node['filesystem'] 。Filesystem2插件包括一种不同的数据格式，可解决Filesystem插件中许多长期存在的错误。

trans-unit.source: In Ohai/Chef releases 13 we replaced the existing Cloud plugin with the Cloud_v2 plugin. This was done by having the Cloud_v2 plugin populate both node['cloud'] and node['cloud_v2']. The Cloud_v2 plugin includes a different data format that resolves many of the longstanding bugs in the existing Cloud plugin.
trans-unit.target: 在Ohai / Chef版本13中，我们将现有的Cloud插件替换为Cloud_v2插件。这是通过让Cloud_v2插件同时填充 node['cloud'] 和 node['cloud_v2'] 。Cloud_v2插件包含不同的数据格式，该数据格式解决了现有Cloud插件中许多长期存在的错误。

trans-unit.source: In Ohai/Chef releases prior to Chef Client 13, Amazon Linux was identified as platform_family 'rhel'. In Ohai/Chef Client 13 and later, Amazon Linux will be identified as the platform_family 'amazon'. When Amazon Linux was created it closely mirrored the structure and package naming of RHEL 5, and with the release of RHEL 6 Amazon Linux moved to closely resemble RHEL 6. With the release of RHEL 7 Red Hat switched to the systemd init system, however Amazon Linux has not yet decided to make that same switch. In addition to the init system differences, Amazon Linux has added many critical packages with their own unique naming conventions. This makes it very hard for users to write cookbooks for RHEL that will work on Amazon Linux systems out of the box. In order to simplify multi-platform cookbook code and to make it more clear when cookbooks actually support Amazon Linux, we’ve created the ‘amazon platform family and removed Amazon Linux from the rhel platform family.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Client 13之前的Ohai / Chef版本中，Amazon Linux被标识为 platform_family 'rhel' 。在Ohai / Chef Client 13及更高版本中，Amazon Linux将被标识为 platform_family 'amazon' 。创建Amazon Linux时，它紧密地反映了RHEL 5的结构和软件包命名，并且随着RHEL 6的发布，Amazon Linux变得与RHEL 6非常相似。随着RHEL 7的发布，Red Hat切换到systemd初始化系统，但是Amazon Linux尚未决定进行相同的切换。除了init系统的差异外，Amazon Linux还添加了许多关键软件包，它们具有自己独特的命名约定。这使用户很难开箱即用地为Amazon Linux系统上的RHEL编写食谱。为了简化多平台食谱代码，并使其在实际支持Amazon Linux的过程中更清晰明了，我们创建了 amazon 平台系列，并将Amazon Linux从 rhel 平台系列中删除。

trans-unit.source: In UNIX, a process environment is a set of key-value pairs made available to a process. Programs expect their environment to contain information required for the program to run. The details of how these key-value pairs are accessed depends on the API of the language being used.

trans-unit.source: In a Chef Backend High Availability deployment, the etcd service is extremely sensitive and can get into a bad state across backend nodes due to disk and/or network latency. When this happens, it is common for the cluster to be unable to automatically failover/recover.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef后端高可用性部署中,etcd服务非常敏感,可能会因为磁盘和/或网络延迟而在后端节点之间陷入不良状态。当这种情况发生时,集群无法自动进行故障转移/恢复是很常见的。

trans-unit.source: In a disaster recovery scenario, the backup and restore processes allow you to restore a data backup into a newly built cluster. It is not intended for the recovery of an individual machine in the chef-backend cluster or for a point-in-time rollback of an existing cluster.
trans-unit.target: 在灾难恢复场景中,备份和恢复过程允许您将数据备份恢复到新建的集群中。它不是为了恢复厨师后台集群中的单个机器,也不是为了对现有集群进行时间点回滚。

trans-unit.source: In a leader-follower topology, one of the members of the service group is elected the leader, and the other members of that service group become the followers of that leader. This topology is common for database systems like MySQL or PostgreSQL, where applications send writes to one member, and those writes are replicated to one or more read replicas.
trans-unit.target: 在leader-follower拓扑中,服务组中的一个成员被选为领导者,而该服务组的其他成员则成为该领导者的跟随者。这种拓扑结构在MySQL或PostgreSQL等数据库系统中很常见,在这些系统中,应用程序向一个成员发送写操作,这些写操作被复制到一个或多个读操作副本中。

trans-unit.source: In a specified recipe
trans-unit.target: 在指定的配方中

trans-unit.source: In a very similar example, a change can still ship if it is related to a breakage as long as that breakage does not occur in an immediate upstream dependency. Again, assume the same change is made to project A that broke project B. Then, a change is made to project E that passes its project tests. A project with changes can only impact projects that consume it, so project E is safe to promote although its dependency project C is blocked due to project C’s dependency on project A. This promotion of project E’s change can happen because the version of project C in Union and Rehearsal is still what it was before the change to project A was pushed through the pipeline and broke project B’s run-time tests in Union.
trans-unit.target: 在非常相似的示例中，只要与破损有关的更改仍然可以发布，只要该破损不在直接上游依赖中发生即可。再次，假定对破坏项目B的项目A进行了相同的更改。然后，对通过项目测试的项目E进行了更改。具有更改的项目只能影响使用它的项目，因此尽管依赖于项目C，但由于项目C对项目A的依赖关系而导致项目C的受阻，因此可以安全地推广项目E。由于项目C的版本位于联合与排练仍然是在对项目A的更改通过管道进行并破坏了项目B在Union中的运行时测试之前的状态。

trans-unit.source: In addition Chef InSpec provides additional resources that are not available in Serverspec:

trans-unit.source: In addition to ‘Maintainer’ access, the ‘Administrator’ role adds the privileges for writing origin keys and membership roles, as well as for reading and writing origin secrets. Administrators have full read and write access to packages, channels, origin membership, jobs, keys, integrations, invitations, roles, secrets, settings.
trans-unit.target: 除了“维护者”访问权限之外，“管理员”角色还添加了用于编写原始密钥和成员身份角色以及读取和写入原始机密的特权。管理员具有对程序包，通道，原始成员身份，作业，密钥，集成，邀请，角色，机密，设置的完全读写权限。

trans-unit.source: In addition to configuration updates, you can upload files to a service group. Keep these small - we recommend 4k or less per file, and keep the count of files to a minimum.
trans-unit.target: 除了配置更新外，您还可以将文件上传到服务组。保持较小的大小-我们建议每个文件4k或更小，并保持最少的文件数。

trans-unit.source: In addition to avoiding system-level gems and modules you should also limit the use of external dependencies to resource packs or plugins. Gems need to be resolved, installed, vendored, and protected from conflicts. We aim to avoid exposing this complexity to users of InSpec, to make it a great tool even if you are not a developer.
trans-unit.target: 除了避免使用系统级的宝石和模块外,你还应该限制使用外部依赖的资源包或插件。宝石需要被解析、安装、销售,并保护其免受冲突。我们的目的是避免将这种复杂性暴露给InSpec的用户,让它成为一个伟大的工具,即使你不是一个开发者。

trans-unit.source: In current versions of Chef, nil was often used to mean that a property had no good default, and needed to be set by the user. However, it is often to useful to set a property to nil, meaning that it’s not set and should be ignored. In Chef Client 13, it is an error to set default: nil on a property if that property doesn’t allow nil as a valid value.
trans-unit.target: 在当前版本的Chef中， nil 通常用于表示属性没有良好的默认值，并且需要由用户设置。但是，将属性设置为 nil 通常很有用，这意味着未设置该属性，应将其忽略。在Chef Client 13中，设置 default: nil 是一个错误：如果某个属性不允许 nil 为有效值，则该属性为nil。

trans-unit.source: In fact, the subprocess wins (because it has to) and this code will result in the content always being nil and the file being empty. The output of the puts debugging will be correct, however, since content is being accessed outside of the file resource scope so it acquires it from the new_resource implicitly (in Chef Client 12.5.1 and Chef Client 13.x)
trans-unit.target: 实际上，子进程获胜（因为必须这样做），并且此代码将导致内容始终为nil，文件为空。但是，由于将在文件资源范围之外访问 content ，因此 puts 调试的输出将是正确的，因此它将隐式地从 new_resource 中获取内容（在Chef Client 12.5.1和Chef Client 13.x中）。

trans-unit.source: In general, attribute precedence is set to enable cookbooks and roles to define attribute defaults, for normal attributes to define the values that should be specific for a node, and for override attributes to force a certain value, even when a node already has that value specified.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,属性优先级的设置是为了让cookbook和角色能够定义属性默认值,让普通属性能够定义一个节点应该具有的特定值,让覆盖属性能够强制执行某个值,即使一个节点已经指定了该值。

trans-unit.source: In general, for production environments Chef recommends to start running Chef Supermarket with small virtual machines, and then increase the size of the virtual machine as necessary. trans-unit.source: In general, notes and warnings are not the best way to present important information. Before using them ask yourself how important the information is. If you want the information to be returned in a search result, then it is better for the information to have its own topic or section heading. trans-unit.source: In its simplest form, chef-run targets a single machine and execute a single resource on that machine:
trans-unit.target: chef-run 以其最简单的形式针对一台机器，并在该机器上执行一个资源：

trans-unit.source: In kitchen-inspec, using the verifier/inputs settings
trans-unit.target: 在厨房检查中，使用 verifier/inputs 设置

trans-unit.source: In large, distributed organizations the ability to modify the configuration of systems is sometimes segmented across teams, often with varying levels of access to those systems. For example, core application services may be deployed to systems by a central server provisioning team, and then developers on different teams build tooling to support specific applications. In this situation, a developer only requires limited access to machines and only needs to perform the operations that are necessary to deploy tooling for a specific application.
trans-unit.target: 在大型分布式组织中,修改系统配置的能力有时会被分割到不同的团队中,而这些团队对这些系统的访问程度往往各不相同。例如,核心应用服务可能由中央服务器供应团队部署到系统中,然后不同团队的开发人员构建工具以支持特定的应用。在这种情况下,开发人员只需要对机器进行有限的访问,只需要执行为特定应用部署工具的必要操作。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, it is better to use the package resource instead of this one. This is because when the package resource is used in a recipe, Chef Infra Client will use details that are collected by Ohai at the start of a Chef Infra Client run to determine the correct package application. Using the package resource allows a recipe to be authored in a way that allows it to be used across many platforms.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，最好使用包资源而不是包资源。这是因为在食谱中使用软件包资源时，Chef Infra Client将使用由Ohai在Chef Infra Client运行开始时收集的详细信息来确定正确的软件包应用程序。使用软件包资源可以以一种可以在许多平台上使用的方式来编写配方。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, it is better to use the package resource instead of this one. This is because when the package resource is used in a recipe, the chef-client will use details that are collected by Ohai at the start of the chef-client run to determine the correct package application. Using the package resource allows a recipe to be authored in a way that allows it to be used across many platforms.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，最好使用包资源而不是包资源。这是因为当食谱中使用软件包资源时，厨师客户端将使用厨师在客户端运行开始时由Ohai收集的详细信息来确定正确的软件包应用程序。使用软件包资源可以以一种可以在许多平台上使用的方式来编写配方。

trans-unit.source: In many organizations, a suite of security tests must be run before a change can be deployed. The Build phase is the place to run such scans and checks. (You can also add compliance checks into the functional test suites that run against the deployed artifacts.)
trans-unit.target: 在许多组织中,必须在部署变更之前运行一套安全测试。构建阶段是运行此类扫描和检查的地方。您还可以将合规性检查添加到针对已部署工件运行的功能测试套件中。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the exception handling available within knife is enough to ensure that exception handling for a plugin is consistent with how knife ordinarily behaves. That said, exceptions can also be handled within a knife plugin in the same way they are handled in any Ruby program.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下,刀子内部的异常处理足以保证一个插件的异常处理与刀子通常的行为一致。也就是说,异常也可以在刀子插件中以处理任何Ruby程序的方式进行处理。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, using the empty values for the layout modifiers will prevent the chef-client from passing symbolic linking information to a node during the chef-client run. However, in some cases, it may be preferable to ensure that one (or more) of these layout modifiers do not pass any symbolic linking information to a node during the chef-client run at all. Because each of these layout modifiers are a Hash, the clear instance method can be used to clear out these values.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，对layout修饰符使用空值将防止Chef-client在Chef-client运行期间将符号链接信息传递给节点。但是，在某些情况下，可能最好确保这些布局修饰符中的一个（或多个）在厨师客户端运行期间根本不将任何符号链接信息传递给节点。由于这些布局修饰符都是哈希，因此可以使用 clear 实例方法清除这些值。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you should always start up a Supervisor explicitly, using hab sup runwithout a package identifier argument, especially in production environments.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，尤其是在生产环境中，应始终使用不带包标识符参数的 hab sup run 显式启动Supervisor 。

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios, converting the standby Chef Automate server to a standalone configuration is the simplest way to get Chef Automate itself back up and running, after which you can rebuild a standby server, update the IP address for the standby server, and then reconfigure the Chef Automate configuration to have a primary and standby server.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下,将备用Chef Automate服务器转换为独立配置是让Chef Automate本身恢复运行的最简单方法,之后可以重建备用服务器,更新备用服务器的IP地址,然后重新配置Chef Automate配置,使其拥有主服务器和备用服务器。

trans-unit.source: In most usage cases via Chef Workstation, this license will already have been accepted and will transfer across transparently. But if a user installs Chef Workstation and the first command they ever run is knife bootstrap, it will perform the same license acceptance flow as the Chef Infra Client product.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，通过Chef Workstation进行使用时，此许可已被接受，并将透明地转让。但是，如果用户安装了Chef Workstation，并且他们运行的第一个命令是“ knife bootstrap ，它将执行与Chef Infra Client产品相同的许可证接受流程。

trans-unit.source: In non-Chef Ruby, the syntax is include (without the : prefix), but without the : prefix Chef Infra Client will try to find a provider named include. Using the : prefix tells Chef Infra Client to look for the specified class that follows.
trans-unit.target: 在非Chef Ruby中，语法为 include （不带 : 前缀），但不带 : 前缀，Chef Infra Client将尝试查找名为 include 的提供程序。使用 : 前缀告诉Chef Infra Client查找后面的指定类。

trans-unit.source: In non-Chef Ruby, the syntax is include (without the : prefix), but without the : prefix the chef-client will try to find a provider named include. Using the : prefix tells the chef-client to look for the specified class that follows.
trans-unit.target: 在非Chef Ruby中，语法为 include （不带 : 前缀），但不带 : 前缀，chef-client将尝试查找名为 include 的提供程序。使用 : 前缀告诉厨师客户查找后面的指定类。

trans-unit.source: In older versions of Chef Client, it was not possible to discern why a chef run exited simply by examining the error code. This makes it very tricky for tools such as Test Kitchen to reason about the status of a Chef Client run. Starting in Chef Client 12.11, there are now well defined exit codes that the Chef Client can use to communicate the status of the run.
trans-unit.target: 在旧版本的Chef Client中,仅仅通过检查错误代码是无法辨别Chef运行退出的原因的。这使得Test Kitchen等工具在推理Chef Client运行状态时非常棘手。从Chef Client 12.11开始,现在有了定义良好的退出代码,Chef Client可以用来传达运行状态。

trans-unit.source: In order for Chef Habitat’s network functionality to work, the Supervisors must first know which other Supervisors they can communicate with. This is a problem of maintaining “membership lists”, and is achieved using the membership protocol known as [SWIM][SWIM]. As detailed above, we must first “seed” a Supervisor’s membership list with at least one “peer”; that is, another Supervisor that it can communicate with.
trans-unit.target: 为了使Chef Habitat的网络功能正常工作，主管必须首先知道他们可以与哪些其他主管进行通信。这是维护“成员资格列表”的问题，可以使用称为[SWIM] [SWIM]的成员资格协议来解决。如上所述，我们必须首先“种子”具有至少一个“对等成员”的主管的成员资格列表；也就是说，它可以与之通信的另一个主管。

trans-unit.source: In order to read or write 32-bit registry keys on 64-bit machines running Microsoft Windows, the architecture property must be set to :i386. The :x86_64 value can be used to force writing to a 64-bit registry location, but this value is less useful than the default (:machine) because Chef Infra Client returns an exception if :x86_64 is used and the machine turns out to be a 32-bit machine (whereas with :machine, Chef Infra Client is able to access the registry key on the 32-bit machine).
trans-unit.target: 为了在运行Microsoft Windows的64位计算机上读取或写入32位注册表项， architecture 属性必须设置为 :i386 。的 :x86_64 的值可以用来强制写入64位注册表位置，但是这个值比默认的那么有用（ :machine ），因为厨师红外客户端，如果返回异常 :x86_64 的使用和机器原来是32位计算机（而使用 :machine ，Chef Infra Client可以访问32位计算机上的注册表项）。

trans-unit.source: In order to read or write 32-bit registry keys on 64-bit machines running Microsoft Windows, the architecture property must be set to :i386. The :x86_64 value can be used to force writing to a 64-bit registry location, but this value is less useful than the default (:machine) because the chef-client returns an exception if :x86_64 is used and the machine turns out to be a 32-bit machine (whereas with :machine, the chef-client is able to access the registry key on the 32-bit machine).
trans-unit.target: 为了在运行Microsoft Windows的64位计算机上读取或写入32位注册表项， architecture 属性必须设置为 :i386 。的 :x86_64 的值可以用来强制写入64位注册表位置，但是这个值比默认的那么有用（ :machine ），因为厨师的客户端，如果返回异常 :x86_64 的使用和机器原来是是32位计算机（而使用 :machine ，chef-client可以访问32位计算机上的注册表项）。

trans-unit.source: In order to run a Chef Habitat-packaged service, you must first run a Chef Habitat Supervisor. There are two ways to start up a Supervisor, and it is important to know the implications of each, and which method is appropriate for your circumstances. These instructions describe the behavior of the 0.56.0 Supervisor and later, which dramatically simplified how Supervisors start up. These instructions also deal with the Supervisor “by itself”; later on, we’ll see how to integrate it into different operational scenarios (e.g., SystemD, Windows Services, etc.). It is useful to understand the underlying concepts first.
trans-unit.target: 为了运行“人居栖息地”打包服务，您必须首先运行“人居栖息地主管”。启动Supervisor的方法有两种，了解每种方法的含义很重要，并且哪种方法适合您的情况。这些说明描述了0.56.0 Supervisor及更高版本的行为，从而极大地简化了Supervisor的启动方式。这些说明还“单独”处理主管。稍后，我们将看到如何将其集成到不同的操作方案中（例如，SystemD，Windows Services等）。首先了解基础概念很有用。

trans-unit.source: In order to support this in containers and provide maximal flexibility, the contents of the /hab directory are both readable and writable by the rootgroup. When specifying a user to run a container process as, the user’s primary group will be reported as root if no matching group can be found in /etc/group. This will allow the user to create and populate the /hab/sup directory for managing Supervisor state, as well as the /hab/svc directory, which will contain all the service’s state. This is in line with recommendations from OpenShift on how to create containers that can run as a non-root user, but nothing in Chef Habitat’s implementation is specific to OpenShift; indeed, all the examples provided below use pure Docker.
trans-unit.target: 为了在容器中支持此功能并提供最大的灵活性， /hab 目录的内容可由 root 用户组读取和写入。指定用户以其身份运行容器进程时，如果在 /etc/group 中找不到匹配的组，则该用户的主要组将被报告为 root 。这将允许用户创建和填充 /hab/sup 目录以管理Supervisor状态，以及 /hab/svc 目录，其中将包含所有服务的状态。这符合OpenShift的建议关于如何创建可以以非root用户身份运行的容器的信息，但Chef Habitat的实现中没有任何内容专门针对OpenShift；实际上，下面提供的所有示例都使用纯Docker。

trans-unit.source: In order to target a remote Supervisor, you must have the appropriate shared secret available, as described above (either in the environment or in the hab CLI configuration file), and you must also specify the specific Supervisor using the --remote-sup option. The value for this option should correspond to the value of --listen-ctl the Supervisor was started with; it is the address and port at which the Supervisor’s control gateway may be reached. All Supervisor interaction commands accept a --remote-sup option for such targeting.
trans-unit.target: 为了以远程Supervisor为目标，您必须如上所述具有相应的可用共享机密（在环境中或在 hab CLI配置文件中），并且还必须使用 --remote-sup 选项指定特定的Supervisor。。此选项的值应与启动 --listen-ctl 的值相对应；它是可以到达Supervisor的控制网关的地址和端口。所有Supervisor交互命令均接受 --remote-sup 选项用于此类定向。

trans-unit.source: In order to tell Builder about the location of the individual plan files, and in order provide more fine-grained control over when component packages are built, you can programmatically customize how and when Builder will build your plans by specifying build behavior in a .bldr.toml file at the root of the repository that you connect to Builder.
trans-unit.target: 为了向Builder告知各个计划文件的位置，并提供对何时构建组件包的更细粒度的控制，您可以通过在 .bldr.toml 指定构建行为来以编程方式自定义Builder将如何以及何时构建计划。连接到Builder的存储库根目录中的.toml文件。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the value for a property cannot be known until the execution phase of a Chef Infra Client run. In this situation, using lazy evaluation of property values can be helpful. Instead of a property being assigned a value, it may instead be assigned a code block. trans-unit.source: In the job feed, for a brief period after a job completes, the event stream will remain available. The request will behave as normal, which means the client will see the stream of events from the beginning of the job (or if specified, the Last-Event-ID), through to the job completion, and then the connection will be immediately closed by the server. The amount of time before it completes is configurable, but defaults to 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 在作业供稿中，作业完成后的短时间内，事件流将保持可用状态。该请求将正常运行，这意味着客户端将看到从作业开始（或指定的 Last-Event-ID ）到作业完成的事件流，然后该连接将立即关闭由服务器。完成之前的时间是可配置的，但默认为5秒。

trans-unit.source: In this case the subscribes property reloads the nginx service whenever its certificate file, located under /etc/nginx/ssl/example.crt, is updated. subscribes does not make any changes to the certificate file itself, it merely listens for a change to the file, and executes the :reload action for its resource (in this example nginx) when a change is detected.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，每当其证书文件位于 /etc/nginx/ssl/example.crt 下时， subscribes 属性就会重新加载 nginx 服务。 subscribes 不会对证书文件本身进行任何更改，它仅侦听对文件的更改，并在检测到更改时对其资源（在本示例中为 nginx ）执行 :reload 操作。

trans-unit.source: Ingest rules allow ingested events and nodes to be added to projects. Node corresponds to ingested client run and compliance nodes, and Event corresponds to ingested events on the Event Feed page.
trans-unit.target: 摄取规则允许将摄取的事件和节点添加到项目中。节点对应于摄取的客户端运行和合规性节点，事件对应于“事件摘要”页面上的摄取的事件。

trans-unit.source: Ingest rules can be created or changed by navigating to Projects in the Settings tab and then selecting a project. When you create or update ingest rules, those changes are staged and not directly applied. Other users may also stage changes.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过导航到“设置”选项卡中的“项目”，然后选择一个项目来创建或更改摄取规则。创建或更新提取规则时，这些更改是分段的，不会直接应用。其他用户也可能上演更改。

trans-unit.source: Ingested events require conditions of Event type to be associated with the correct project. A condition of type Node will not match an event, even if the condition’s operator, attribute, and value all match exactly (and vice versa with Event project rules and nodes).
trans-unit.target: 摄取的事件需要将 Event 类型的条件与正确的项目相关联。即使条件的运算符，属性和值都完全匹配（对于 Event 项目规则和节点，反之亦然）， Node 类型的条件将不匹配事件。

trans-unit.source: Inputs are available throughout the InSpec profile DSL. You can use them anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 输入在整个InSpec profile DSL中都可以使用。您可以在任何地方使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Inputs are documented in detail in the input documentation.
trans-unit.target: 输入在输入文档中有详细记录。

trans-unit.source: Inputs are the “knobs” you can use to customize the behavior of Chef InSpec profiles. If a profile supports inputs, you can set the inputs in a variety of ways, allowing flexibility. Profiles that include other profiles can set inputs in the included profile, enabling a multi-layered approach to configuring profiles.
trans-unit.target: 输入是可用于自定义Chef InSpec配置文件行为的“旋钮”。如果概要文件支持输入，那么可以通过多种方式设置输入，从而具有灵活性。包含其他配置文件的配置文件可以在包含的配置文件中设置输入，从而可以采用多层方法配置配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Inputs can also be set by custom input plugins, which retrieve values from external sources like secret stores or databases. Please check RubyGems.org for available InSpec input plugins.
trans-unit.target: 输入也可以通过自定义输入插件设置，该插件从诸如秘密存储或数据库之类的外部源检索值。请检查RubyGems.org以获取可用的InSpec输入插件。

trans-unit.source: Inputs were formerly known as attributes. Chef InSpec inputs are unrelated to Chef Infra attributes.
trans-unit.target: 输入以前称为 attributes 。Chef InSpec输入与Chef Infra属性无关。

trans-unit.source: Inspec 2+ supports running scan jobs against your AWS account configuration, such as CloudWatch or IAM, see more here. Set up Chef Automate to run these scan jobs by providing your AWS Credentials and creating an AWS API Node Manager in the Node Integrations page in the Settings tab.
trans-unit.target: Inspec 2+支持针对您的AWS账户配置（例如CloudWatch或IAM）运行扫描作业，请参阅此处的更多内容。通过提供您的AWS凭证并在“设置”选项卡的“节点集成”页面中创建一个AWS API节点管理器，来设置Chef Automate以运行这些扫描作业。

trans-unit.source: Inspec 2+ supports running scan jobs against your Azure account configuration, such as network security groups and ad users. See Azure resources for more information. Set up Chef Automate to run these scan jobs by providing your Azure credentials and creating an Azure API Node Manager.
trans-unit.target: Inspec 2+支持针对您的Azure帐户配置（例如网络安全组和广告用户）运行扫描作业。有关更多信息，请参见Azure资源。通过提供您的Azure凭据并创建一个Azure API节点管理器，来设置Chef Automate来运行这些扫描作业。
